answers.author: Barry Crook
answers.text:
I've posted the RFP and the agreement with the vendor chosen (the National Research Center, who does the National Citizen Survey that so many ICMA cities sign onto) . . . contact me at barry.crook@ci.aspen.co.us if you have questions.

author: Unknown
text:
The City of Richmond is looking for examples of RFP's (or content from RFP's) for conducting a citizen survey, including an analysis of the results compared to similar cities and presentations of the results to senior staff and citizens. 
Thanks!
title: RFP for citizen survey
